name: Classic Slings
description: The Classic Sling is made from premium quality non-pilling double sided microfleece.  It is offered in 3 colours; Jewel/Raspberry, Dimple blue/Navy, and Black/Pebble.  Each sling sports a unique motif which can be worn on the outside for all to see or inside to hide.  The colours and styles are suitable for both mom and dad! They are reversible and range from sizes small, medium, large and extra large.

name: ECO-Baby Pouch Sling
description: The ECO Sling is made from 2 types of fabric: the inside contains bamboo/organic cotton which is gentle, naturally antibacterial  and soft for your baby’s skin. The outside is made of an environmentally friendly repreve/recycled fleece.  The ECO sling comes in a variety of colours; Navy/Jewel, Navy/Rabbit, Tan/Jewel, Tan/Rabbit, and Tan/Green.  They are reversible and range from sizes small, medium, large and extra large.

name: ECO Blanket
description:
ECO Blanket generously-sized at 29” x 38” is a great accessory to mix and match with your ECO Sling or to buy separately.  Like the ECO Sling, it is made of a 2 types of fabrics making it reversible.  The inside is made from a blend of bamboo/organic cotton which is gentle, naturally anti-bacterial and soft on your 
baby’s skin.  The outside is made of an environmentally friendly repreve/recycled fleece. The ECO Blanket comes in a variety of colours: Navy/Jewel; Navy/Rabbit;Navy/Egret; Tan/Jewel; Tan/Rabbit and Tan/Green.  The ECO Blankets each have a 
special motif on the bottom right hand corner and have a 1x1 rib binding around the circumference. The ECO Blankets come in one size.

name: Le Petit Chapeau
description: Le Petit Chapeau One-piece hat and scarf combo in this winter's hottest colours. No more lost scarves or hats – conveniently sewn together so your little one can stay snug, you can just grab this essential winter accessory and go. For infants wear it brim up to create a snug fit - for tots wear it brim down or up. Made from a high quality anti-pill double-sided microfleece.

name: The French Toil Bib
description: The French Toil Bib is a unique baby accessory you and your baby will love.Marie Antoinette was a fan and your baby will be too! Now your little one can drool (literally) all over this cotton/linen blend toile. Reverse the bib to expose the RepreveTM microfleece – a perfect fabric for messy eating times. The toile design is cut so every Bib is unique, just like your baby.
